pr_title: AsyncSearchMaintenanceService should stop when closing a node

timeline.message:
AsyncSearchMaintenanceService should stop when closing a node

This change turns the AsyncSearchMaintenanceService into an
AbstractLifecycleComponent and ensures that the service is
stopped when a node is closing.

Closes #55646

timeline.bodyText: Just a suggestion, I'm unsure, but would it be possible to use the lifecyle state that comes with AbstractLifecycleComponent now instead of this internal isClosed flag? To me it looks AbstractLifecycleComponent#close() moves the state to CLOSED before calling doClose() here. Please ignore if I'm wrong, would like to understand the difference in that case.
timeline.author: cbuescher

replies.bodyText: That's a good suggestion, I pushed another commit to apply the change that you're suggesting.
replies.author: jimczi
